custom_sparks_product_onboarding_text_en: And in Monday4ME there is a program of loyalty the program of self -care is sparks. You can accumulate points by taking care of yourself, and then pay them up to 50% of the cost of subscription to a psychologist. For example, every 5 daily checks in a row give you +5 üí• A complete list of tasks for which sparks are accrued, you will find in the section üòÑ my profile -> üè¶ finances
notification_time_text_en: Let's configure the time üòä Chekapa ‚Äî notes about the mood ‚Äî to make it easier to keep üìÖ Diary I promise to send no more than one notification per day ü§û
onboarding_second_step_text_en: üìë A checkup is a mini-survey that helps you evaluate the level of anxiety and stress and catch the connection between negative emotions and their causes üß† Why are checkups helpful? If you checkup regularly and systematically, you notice emotinal challenges on time and get insights on their causes with analytics
product_onboarding_checkup_text_en: Accumulating checks , you can consider the mood changes on the graphs If there is a pattern in the mood, I will try to tell you it For convenience in check you can add your causes of emotions and additional questions
product_onboarding_diary_text_en: The path to happiness begins with systemic observation of the emotional state To do this, I have üìÜ diary that will help you regularly record emotions and note what they are connected with One recording of emotions is called check
product_onboarding_therapists_chat_text_: A unique feature of checks is that they greatly simplify communication with a psychologist a) Data about checks can be shared with a psychologist, plunging it into context before the start of the first session b) During your communication, the psychologist receives notifications about your checks to keep his hand on the pulse
product_onboarding_therapists_text_en: If you want to discuss your condition with someone, I will help you find an interlocutor a) I have üëã tips ‚Äî an anonymous exchange system of questions between users b) there are still experienced üë©üèª‚Äçü¶≥ psychologists , with each of which you can contact directly through online chat
second_onboarding_step_text_en: Why not discuss your emotions? Inside there is a whole social platform where you can: - Anonymously ask for üëã Advice from the community - Limitlessly ask questions from universal consciousness: neural network - Find a üë©üèª‚Äçü¶≥ Psychologist to talk online by chat or video
third_onboarding_step_text_en: And more... for regular checkups you get sparks üí• Sparks are like bonus points ‚Äî spend them on sessions with psychologists: 1üí• = 2 cents And for the first checkup you instantly get 20 üí•

new_year_game_menu_text_en: wow, well, year, tell me? So many things have happened that it is difficult to remember everything at once (and I want to forget something soon). Previously, at the end of the year there were so many worries and deeds, but now I want to hug loved ones and just be all together ‚ù§Ô∏è I know what to do! Let's play ‚ùÑÔ∏è Mugs-snugs -we will sculpt them from warm words to become closer. The rules of the game are simple: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Throw your snowball with warm words to another person 2Ô∏è‚É£ Catch someone else's snowball immediately after!

Try to record a circle for at least 10 seconds and wish a person at the other end of something pleasant in the new year ü•∞
